page.title: 18Industry
page.content: The area is mainly{residential}with attendant{shopping centres.}The only large industry in the D-block is the {Mitchells and Butlers brewery, Cape {Hill, Smethwick.}There are however many{smaller activities}which are either{isolated,}or collected on small {industrial estates.}Here is an example. At{Weekin-Works on Park Hill Rd, {Harborne}there are collected many different businesses eg.boat builder, re-upholsterer,fibres moulding, a transport company, fashion designer, photographic studio and training centre.{A mixture of service and light {industry.}Earlier this was the site of the famous Chad Valley toy company and before that the Sunshine Laundry.
